name: ROOTZ
description:
Roots are the FOUNDATION of every tree! They must work TOGETHER to feed nutrients and minerals to the beautiful trees that give us the air we breathe~

BUT NOT HERE!! FUCK UR FRIENDS, UR GOAL IS TO BE THE BIGGEST AND STRONGEST OF ROOTS!!

HOW 2 PLAY

Press ANY key (aside from return or escape) to join as a ROOT!! Press it again to remove it!!

Everyone plays with a single button!!

When everyone has their button, press RETURN to start playing!!

Everyone presses their button to move in the direction of the arrow!!

Move your root through water!! The more water you soak up the BIGGER YOU GET!!

Run out of water or collide with another root and you will EXPLODE!!

Last root alive WINS!!

Press RETURN to reset the game with the same players!!

CREDITS

Plum: design + sound + art asset finding

Noé: programming + some art + made the arrow sprite :)

Made in ✨ 12 hours ✨ for Global Game Jam!! 

This is a shitpost of a game and we grabbed the art from image search so dont sue us lmao
